definitions.title: n. pr. loc
definitions.body: No = Thebes (Eg. nt, city, i.e. prob. nē(t), v. Steind:BAS i. 596 f.; As. Ni-’u, Ni-i’ Dl:Par 318 Steind:l. c. Schr:COT gloss.; Tel Am. Nî (Ni-i) Wkl:Tel Am 39 * Bez:Tel Am. in BM 153);—[[הִנְנִי]] [[פוֹקֵד אֶל־אָמוֹן מִנּאׁ]] Je 46:25 Amon from (of, LXX e)n = [[בְּ]]) No; [[נאׁ אָמוֹן]] Na 3:8 No of Amon (= city of god Ammon, = LXX Dio/soliv Ez Eze 30:14, Eze 30:16 Steind:l. c.; v. also Jerem. and Billerbeck:BAS iii.104 f.); Ez Eze 30:14 (‖[[פַּתְרוֹס]], [[חׂ֫עַן]]), [[וְהִכְרַתִּי אֶת־הֲמוֹן נאׁ]] v:Eze 30:15 (‖[[סִין]]; but LXX Co Berthol [[נׁף]] q. v. for [[נׁא]]) v:Eze 30:16 (‖[[סִין]], Co [[סון]]). It lay on the right bank of the Nile, c. 400 miles (by the river) S. of Memphis.
